name: The Tower (itch) (Rastrojar)
description: Legends tell that somewhere in the world there is a huge tower with a hundred floors, and that if you reach the top of it, one of your wishes will come true, but although many have tried, none have succeeded. And you? How far would you go to make your wish come true? Would you sacrifice your loved ones to fulfill your wish? But most importantly, will you be the first to reach the top or just one of the many who have lost everything along the way? (Currently only 35 floors are available).
